data.text: Smart Plate is a programmable 'Physical Bookmark' on the IoT which connects directly everything/everywhere with varied digital content like SNS, videos, maps, contact information, product information, entertainment content, etc. via unique QR code or embedded NFC tag. Plates are trackable and controllable on the app over-the-air anytime even if you are not there, and are capable of being overwritten repeatedly. All plates store an activation code and geocode for copy protection purpose.

Just tap NFC smartphones※ or scan QR code. No need installing specific app to get content except general barcode scanner. ※
※In the case of NFC, you must need the state is on and unlock the screen.
※In case of delivery via BLE(Bluetooth Low Energy) Beacon, as an option, require specific app to install.

【Content List】

When you tap the content list from the menu on the left, the category and list of the content that registered in the management screen are displayed. Tap the content appears content detail screen.

【Content Detail】

In the content detail screen, you can check the content image, name, linked information, the plate information that is relevant.
Press the 'Link via Smart Plate' button and holding up the Smart Plate (NFC compatible handsets only) or scan the QR code, you can associate it.

【Plate List】

When you tap the plate list from the menu on the left, the category and list of the plate that registered in the management screen are displayed. Tap the plate appears plate detail screen.

【Plate Detail】

In the plate detail screen, you can check the plate image, name, linked information, the content information that is relevant.
Press the 'Set Content' button and select the content, you can associate it.

【Activate】

When you tap 'Activate' from the menu on the left, the activate screen is displayed. Tap the content appears content detail screen.The plate hold up, or to scan the QR code. Then you can register by entering the activation code that is described in the plate.

【Link】
                    
You can associate to tap the button of the red frame of the each detail screen.
Also, information in real time is updated without re-association when you edit the contents after the association.

【Analytics】
                    
When you tap each period of the home screen, can check the content or plate analytics information. It is displayed daily number of taps, number of unique users, tap count of NFC and QR code, etc. When you tap the rankings to switch to display in the content or plate units. Also when you tap the duration of the bar graph, can check A 24-hour display of that day.

【Analytics of every hour】
                    
Can check the content, or usage of the plate every hour.

【Analytics of every minute】
                    
Can check the content, or usage of the plate every minute.
